content.raw:
found a problem with missing collision visuals when loading a non-empty world with models. Fixed in 3b440e1. @chapulina I had to revert the changes in `Collision::FillMsg` otherwise gzclient doesn't get the collision visual msgs. We can figure out a way to move that logic to the client in a later pull request.

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/701/) - ok
content.html:
found a problem with missing collision visuals when loading a non-empty world with models. Fixed in 3b440e1. @chapulina I had to revert the changes in Collision::FillMsg otherwise gzclient doesn't get the collision visual msgs. We can figure out a way to move that logic to the client in a later pull request.

homebrew - ok
